T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, l.id as lid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id ;

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, l.id as lid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id right join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, l.id as lid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.site_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, l.id as lid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id and d.id = i.site_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, l.id as lid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.parent_id = md.id right join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id  and d.id = i.site_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id right join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id ;
